text: The Catholic University of the North () is a Catholic university in Antofagasta, Chile. It is one of the universities in the north of Chile. == Faculties == * Civil engineering & Construction * Sciences * Sea sciences * Economy & Management * Engineering & Geologic sciences * Humanities * Medicine == Other websites == * Catholic University of the North Antofagasta Category:Antofagasta Category:1956 establishments in South America Category:20th-century establishments in Chile
title: Catholic University of the North
